post.description: Authenticates a Reseller account using email and password credentials. Upon successful authentication, returns a JWT access token that must be used for all subsequent secured API requests.

x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X POST 'https://portal.esimcard.com/api/developer/reseller/login' \
-H 'Content-Type: application/json' \
-d '{"email":"dealer123@gmail.com", "password":"testUser123"}'

<?php
$ch = curl_init('https://portal.esimcard.com/api/developer/reseller/login');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, ['Content-Type: application/json']);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, json_encode(['email' => 'dealer123@gmail.com', 'password' => 'testUser123']));
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);
echo $response;
?>

post.description: Terminates the current authenticated reseller session by invalidating the active JWT access token. After logout, the token becomes invalid and cannot be used to access protected endpoints.

x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X POST 'https://portal.esimcard.com/api/developer/reseller/logout' \
-H 'Authorization: Bearer 34343178|AdcidN1xsNjddsbTMKyActAfjdsalfasfdjalsfas34343' \
-H 'Content-Type: application/json'

<?php
$ch = curl_init('https://portal.esimcard.com/api/developer/reseller/logout');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
  'Content-Type: application/json',
  'Authorization: Bearer 34343178|AdcidN1xsNjddsbTMKyActAfjdsalfasfdjalsfas34343'
]);
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);
echo $response;
?>

import requests

url = 'https://portal.esimcard.com/api/developer/reseller/logout'
headers = {
  'Content-Type': 'application/json',
  'Authorization': 'Bearer 34343178|AdcidN1xsNjddsbTMKyActAfjdsalfasfdjalsfas34343'
}
response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

get.description: Retrieves a comprehensive list of all available eSIM bundles and their pricing details. Each bundle includes information such as country, data allowance, validity period, and cost. This endpoint allows authorized resellers to display or compare bundle options available for purchase and activation.

x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X GET 'https://portal.esimcard.com/api/developer/reseller/pricing' \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer <your_access_token>'

<?php
$ch = curl_init('https://portal.esimcard.com/api/developer/reseller/pricing');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
  'Authorization: Bearer <your_access_token>'
]);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);
echo $response;
?>

401.description: Unauthorized — Missing or invalid access token.

get.description: Retrieves a paginated list of all available eSIM packages. Each package includes details such as data, voice, and SMS allowances, pricing, and validity duration. This endpoint also supports filtering by package type (e.g., data-only or data + voice + SMS), allowing resellers to quickly identify and compare plans that best fit their customers’ needs.

parameters.name: package_type
parameters.description: Filter packages by type (e.g., 'DATA-ONLY' or 'DATA-VOICE-SMS'). Defaults to 'DATA-ONLY'.

x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X GET 'https://portal.esimcard.com/api/developer/reseller/packages?package_type=DATA-ONLY' \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer <your_access_token>'

<?php
$ch = curl_init('https://portal.esimcard.com/api/developer/reseller/packages?package_type=DATA-ONLY');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
  'Authorization: Bearer <your_access_token>'
]);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);
echo $response;
?>

401.description: Unauthorized — Missing or invalid access token.

get.description: Retrieves comprehensive details for a specific eSIM package using its unique ID. The response includes the package’s data, voice, and SMS allowances, pricing, validity period, and a list of supported countries. Each country entry provides network coverage details, including available network names and supported generations (2G/3G/4G/5G).

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: The unique UUID of the eSIM package to retrieve.

x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X GET 'https://portal.esimcard.com/api/developer/reseller/package/details/f31588d2-805e-4723-96e7-17b2d70a2626' \
  -H 'Authorization: Bearer <your_access_token>'

<?php
$packageId = 'f31588d2-805e-4723-96e7-17b2d70a2626';
$url = 'https://portal.esimcard.com/api/developer/reseller/package/details/' . $packageId;
$ch = curl_init($url);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
  'Authorization: Bearer <your_access_token>'
]);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, true);
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);
echo $response;
?>

import requests

package_id = 'f31588d2-805e-4723-96e7-17b2d70a2626'
url = f'https://portal.esimcard.com/api/developer/reseller/package/details/{package_id}'
headers = {
  'Authorization': 'Bearer <your_access_token>'
}
response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

401.description: Unauthorized — Missing or invalid access token.

get.description: Get list of available countries where packages are available.

x-codeSamples.source: curl -X GET "https://portal.esimcard.com/api/developer/reseller/packages/country" -H "accept: application/json" -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN"

x-codeSamples.label: fetch

x-codeSamples.source:
import requests

url = 'https://portal.esimcard.com/api/developer/reseller/packages/country'
headers = {
    'accept': 'application/json',
    'Authorization': 'Bearer YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN'
}
response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

<?php

$curl = curl_init();

curl_setopt_array($curl, array(
  CURLOPT_URL => 'https://portal.esimcard.com/api/developer/reseller/packages/country',
  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'accept: application/json',
    'Authorization: Bearer YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);
curl_close($curl);

echo $response;
?>

-H "accept: application/json" \
-H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN"

  CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER => true,
  CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER => array(
    'accept: application/json',
    'Authorization: Bearer YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN'
  ),
));

$response = curl_exec($curl);
curl_close($curl);

echo $response;

x-codeSamples.source: curl -X GET "https://portal.esimcard.com/api/developer/reseller/packages/continent" -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN"

curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, 'https://portal.esimcard.com/api/developer/reseller/packages/continent');
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, 1);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, ['Authorization: Bearer YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN']);

401.description: Unauthorized — Bearer token missing or invalid.

get.description: Retrieves available eSIM packages for a specific continent, filtered optionally by package type (e.g., DATA-ONLY or DATA-VOICE-SMS). The response includes package details such as data allowance, price, validity, and whether the package offers unlimited usage.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Unique numeric ID of the continent to retrieve packages for.

x-codeSamples.source: curl -X GET "https://portal.esimcard.com/api/developer/reseller/packages/continent/1?package_type=DATA-ONLY" -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN"

<?php
$ch = curl_init();
$url = 'https://portal.esimcard.com/api/developer/reseller/packages/continent/1?package_type=DATA-ONLY';
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, 1);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, ['Authorization: Bearer YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN']);
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);
echo $response;

post.description: Check if an eSIM can be topped up

x-codeSamples.source:
curl -X POST "https://portal.esimcard.com/api/developer/reseller/can-topup-esim" \
  -H "Content-Type: application/json" \
  -H "Authorization: Bearer YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN" \
  -d '{"imei": "356938035643809"}'

<?php
$ch = curl_init();
$url = 'https://portal.esimcard.com/api/developer/reseller/can-topup-esim';
$data = json_encode(['imei' => '356938035643809']);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_URL, $url);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POST, 1);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_POSTFIELDS, $data);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_RETURNTRANSFER, 1);
curl_setopt($ch, CURLOPT_HTTPHEADER, [
  'Content-Type: application/json',
  'Authorization: Bearer YOUR_ACCESS_TOKEN'
]);
$response = curl_exec($ch);
curl_close($ch);
echo $response;
